altername_name: Kyoto Ryuu no Tera Satsujin Jiken
name: Yamamura Misa Suspense: Kyoto Ryuu no Tera Satsujinjiken
overview: Yamamura Misa Suspense: Kyoto Ryuu no Tera Satsujin Jiken (roughly "Yamamura Misa Suspense: Murder Case of the Kyoto Buddhist Temple Dragon") is the first in a series of murder mystery games from Taito, based on the work of prolific Japanese mystery writer Yamamura Misa. Like many of its crime adventure game peers, the goal is to track down a killer using the provided detective skills: examining crime scenes, collecting evidence and talking to suspects and other helpful NPCs. The game, and its sequels, were never localized or released outside of Japan.
